Docs.summary: Returns an input stream from the server in the case of an error such as the requested file has not been found on the remote server.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool FollowRedirects { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Returns the value of followRedirects which indicates if this connection follows a different URL redirected by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFixedLengthStreamingMode(int32 contentLength) cil managed
abstract member SetFixedLengthStreamingMode : int -> unit override this.SetFixedLengthStreamingMode : int -> unit

Docs.param: the fixed length of the HTTP request body.
Docs.summary: Equivalent to setFixedLengthStreamingMode((long) contentLength), but available on earlier versions of Android and limited to 2 GiB.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if already connected or another mode already set.
if contentLength is less than zero.
